job description:
Job Description
We are seeking an recent graduate for our Data Management Specialist! We are a rapidly growing fast paced company that works in the natural disaster industry. Our work is extremely rewarding, both emotionally and financially. We are looking for a dynamic data management specialist in New Orleans, LA. We provide a casual and fun atmosphere for our employees and I strongly encourage you to reach out and speak to me about this current opportunity. YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED!

Responsibilities:
  • Impeccable spreadsheets skills and experience
  • Pivot Tables
  • Formatting Excel Docs
  • MIS/IT Support
Qualifications:
  • Previous experience in data management
  • Substantial knowledge of spreadsheets
  • Strong leadership qualities
  • Ability to work under pressure
We are looking for full time employees to fill our team. Candidates must be located in the New Orleans, LA area to be considered for this position. No recruiters, direct candidates only. Salary will be between $50K-$55K based on Experience plus variable bonus potential.
